name: Dino Postman
description:
Dino Postman is a game about a potman that tamed a little dinosaur and is using it to deliver mail around the fantastical kingdom. 

Try to steer your dinosaur pet around collecting food before your hunger meter maxes out and the dinosaur goes into a hunger frenzy eating peasants. 

The game is made for the GMTK 2020 jam (theme Out of Control). 

Credits:

Game Design --Andrew Gordienko, Mohamed AbdAllah, Sasha Pokhvalin, 

Art -- Andrew Gordienko, Sasha Pokhvalin

Animation -- Andrew Gordienko, Sasha Pokhvalin

Programming -- Mohamed AbdAllah

Music -- David Renda
